title: Looking for T227 Series of Champion Home Run Baker
author: Belfast1933

posts.post_title: Looking for T227 Series of Champion Home Run Baker
posts.post_content:
I’d love to trade for or cash+trade for a nicely centered low grade T227 Series of Champions Home Run Baker.

Saw this card at a local show (Don H, I should have bought it from you as soon as I saw it! 😢) a year or two ago and have been looking ever since.

I have a nice T205 Baker I could include in trade if that may be of interest- 

Here is an illustration, just for show:

Thx

Jeff
